Widget.name: Maps
Widget.Description: Shows your results as pins on a Map, with automatic centering and zoom levels for your result set.

OptionsGroup.name: General
OptionsGroup.Description: Pay attention to terms of use for the configured map provider.

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Default zoom level
Option.Description: Default zoom level used if there is only one pin in the map, min:0 (distant) max:22 (near)

Option.name: Enable geo form edition
Option.Description: If enabled, you will be able to draw polygons or circles on the map.

Option.name: Geo provider
Option.Description: Choose your geo data provider.

Option.name: Api key
Option.Description: Api key.

OptionsGroup.name: Based on Entries
OptionsGroup.Description: Options marked with (1) or (2) are required to have entries support.

Option.name: Address (1)
Option.Description:
MEL expression used for the hit address.
If coordinates are also provided with the Location option, they will have a higher priority than the address.
Note: This functionality is slow because we have to get the coordinates of each addresses.

Option.name: Location (2)
Option.Description:
MEL expression used for the hit position with expected format : latitude,longitude
  • Location : ${entry.metas["meta_of_type_gps_point"]}
  • Latitude + Longitude : ${entry.metas["meta_latitude"]},${entry.metas["meta_longitude"]}

Option.name: Hit URL
Option.Description: Specifies the link to create for each icon. An invalid page name will not create a link.

Option.name: Image URL Marker
Option.Description:
If blank, icon url will be:
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%{indexMarker}|3279BE|FFF
%{indexMarker} is a magic variable which will be replaced by an incremental number

Option.name: Message popup
Option.Description:
Defines the message that will be displayed in the bubble of the pin selection.
This message can contain HTML code.
If you need some logic, try the 'popup template path' option below this option.

Option.name: Popup template path
Option.Description:
JSP template shown in the popup.
You can use JSTL functions to add logics in it.
An example can be found at:
/WEB-INF/jsp/widgets/gmapV3/messagePopup/example_entries.jsp

OptionsGroup.name: Based on Facets
OptionsGroup.Description: Options marked with (1) and one of (2) or (3) are required to have Facets support.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that must be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Facets list (1)
Option.Description: The specified facets, separated by commas.

Option.name: Address (2)
Option.Description:
MEL expression used for the category address.
If coordinates are also provided with the Location option, they will have a higher priority than the address.
Note: This functionality is slow because we have to get the coordinates of each addresses.

Option.name: Location(3)
Option.Description:
MEL expression used for the category position with expected format : latitude,longitude
  • Location : ${category.description}

Option.name: Number of categories displayed
Option.Description: Specifies the maximum number of categories to display. You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Iteration mode
Option.Description:
Determines what data is displayed:
  • 'all' visits the first child of each node before processing its siblings,
  • 'leaves' iterates recursively, returning the end nodes,
  • 'flat' returns only the first level.

Option.name: Image URL Marker
Option.Description:
If blank, icon url will be:
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%{indexMarker}|3279BE|FFF
%{indexMarker} is a magic variable which will be replaced by an incremental number.

Option.name: Message popup
Option.Description:
Defines the message that will be displayed in the bubble of the pin selection.
This message can contain HTML code.
If you need some logic, try the 'popup template path' option below this option.
Aggregation: This field is evaluated so you can use MEL ( ${category.aggrs["your_aggregation"]} ) to get aggregation value in your popup

Option.name: Popup template path
Option.Description:
JSP template shown in the popup. You can use JSTL functions to add logics in it. An example can be found at:
/WEB-INF/jsp/widgets/gmapV3/messagePopup/example_facets.jsp

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.

Option.name: Geo facets list
Option.Description: The specified geo facets, separated by commas.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that must be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.

Option.name: Aggregation
Option.Description: Aggregation used to colorize shape

OptionsGroup.name: Ajax
OptionsGroup.Description: On map move, Lattitude parameter's name & Longitude parameter's name parameters are append to the query string

Option.name: Update Widgets
Option.Description: On map move, refresh the list of given widgets identified by a unique ID called WUID.

Option.name: Latitude parameter's name
Option.Description: Specifies the parameter name that will be used for latitude in queries. For example 'lat'.

Option.name: Longitude parameter's name
Option.Description: Specifies the parameter name that will be used for longitude in queries. For example 'lng'.

Option.name: Zoom level parameter's name
Option.Description: Specifies the parameter name that will be used for zoom level in queries. For example 'zoomlevel'.

Option.name: CSS class name
Option.Description: CSS class name for icons.

Option.name: Icon AnchorX
Option.Description: Specifies the pixel relative to the top left corner of the icon image to which this icon is anchored in the map.

Option.name: Icon AnchorY
Option.Description: Specifies the pixel relative to the top left corner of the icon image to which this icon is anchored in the map.

Option.name: Popup AnchorX
Option.Description: Specifies the pixel relative to the top left corner of the popup to which this icon is anchored in the map.

Option.name: Popup AnchorY
Option.Description: Specifies the pixel relative to the top left corner of the popup to which this icon is anchored in the map.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the foreground image of the icon (pixels).

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the foreground image of the icon (pixels).

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the Google Map widget (pixels).

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the Google Map widget (pixels).
